Life is a non-custodial, multi-chain wallet that lets users transact crypto via simple @nickname.

There are state of the art features that include username purchase, import accounts, names on transactions, and many more exciting features.

The future of LIFE looks amazing with a marketplace in the works, swap functionality, on/off ramp, and
